item.description:
Come join me for a night of fun and drinks at The Cantab Lounge/Club Bohemia in Cambridge!  I play pop, rock and alternative originals and I write most of my songs. My music is about having a positive outlook on life. I try to write with the intent of helping people from all walks of life get past their fears and accomplish satisfaction in their lives. If I can reach people through my music, I believe I am helping my fans one by one.  

 

The Cantab Lounge offers a full bar and a wide assortment of domestic and imported beers.  The Boston Phoenix chose The Cantab Lounge for "The Best - Art+ Entertainment".  Check them out at their website: www.cantab-lounge.com.  The Cantab Lounge is located just off of the Central Square T stop on the Red Line. Please e-mail me if you need directions by car.

 

There is a cover charge of $7, cash only. Feel free to check out my music on my website at:www.jodigriffith.com. Peace!

- Jodi
item.how_to_find_us: I WILL BE DOWNSTAIRS AT CLUB BOHEMIA AT A TABLE WITH A MEET-UP SIGN
item.name: Drinks and Music Night at The Cantab
